data.eml:eml: Two new species of oribatid mites of the family Galumnidae (Acari, Oribatida) from Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ermilov, Sergey G., Anichkin, Alexander E. (2014): Two new species of oribatid mites of the family Galumnidae (Acari, Oribatida) from Vietnam. ZooKeys 382: 53-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.382.6831, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.382.6831
